name: Shooting Star - The show must go on!
name_original: Shooting Star - The show must go on!
description:
Entry for GameDesign Jam 23

by Fluri Fischer, Yana Yapici, Yevhen Kozlov, Jan Hobi

Will you be the next Shooting Star?!

A two player fighting game in which your goal is to sing better than your rival and to ultimately become the next Shooting Star! 

You must keep the show going or else you both will be known as the worst artists around!
